name: Emoji ♡ Reactions
description:
With Emoji ♡ Reactions, you can leave emoji, stickies and feedback though a variety of responses directly in your Figma documents in real time. Celebrate your teammates' work! ...or troll them with panache.


Emoji ♡ Reactions includes: emoji stickers, live emoji reactions, sticky notes, and chat bubbles. 


Enjoy!


For maximum efficiency, add a Keyboard Shortcut for the Figma Desktop App

  1. Mac: Open System Preferences ▸ Keyboard ▸ Shortcuts ▸ App Shortcuts. 
  2. Add "Emoji Reactions" (for Figma / All Apps) and set it to "Cmd-Opt-M" (recommended)
  3. Emote with abandon.


Source Code: https://github.com/alcor/figma-emoji-reactions
